title: Cannot assign gradient to HalfTensor
body_html:
Issue description

Cannot assign gradient to HalfTensor

Code example

This works:

t = th.nn.Parameter(th.tensor([1.])).cuda()
t.grad = th.tensor([1.]).cuda()

This fails:

t = th.nn.Parameter(th.tensor([1.])).cuda().half()
t.grad = th.tensor([1.]).cuda().half()

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module>
RuntimeError: torch.cuda.sparse.HalfTensor is not enabled.

System Info

  • PyTorch or Caffe2: Pytorch
  • How you installed PyTorch (conda, pip, source): pip
  • Build command you used (if compiling from source):
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04
  • PyTorch version: 0.4.1
  • Python version: 3.5
  • CUDA/cuDNN version: 9.0
  • GPU models and configuration: 1080 GTX
  • GCC version (if compiling from source):
  • CMake version:
  • Versions of any other relevant libraries:
